<!--
function popUpSweeps(url) {
	if (newWindow) {
		if (newWindow.closed == false) {
			newWindow.focus();
		}
	}
	newWindow = window.open(url,'Sweepstakes','toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=0,resizable=0,width=750,height=480,top=50,left=50');
}

function popUpSweepsLarge(url) {
	if (newWindow) {
		if (newWindow.closed == false) {
			newWindow.focus();
		}
	}
	newWindow = window.open(url,'Sweepstakes','toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=0,resizable=0,width=800,height=580,top=50,left=50');
}

<!--
function MajorCatSearch(srchtxt) {
	window.document.searchform.SC.value = srchtxt;
	window.document.searchform.submit();
}

function ValidateSearchForm(frm) {
	if(frm.SV.value.length == 0) {
		alert("Please enter a keyword.");
		return false;
	}
	return true;
}

//var newWindow;
var i = 0;
var newWindow = new Array();


function popUp(url,name) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,name,'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=0,width=580,height=480,left=100,top=50');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}
function popUpSmall(url,name) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,name,'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=0,width=350,height=150,left=100,top=50');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}
function popUpMedium(url,name) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,name,'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=0,width=350,height=250,left=100,top=50');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}
function popUpResize(url,name) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,name,'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=1,width=580,height=400,left=100,top=50');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}

function popUpWide(url,name) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,name,'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=1,resizable=0,width=700,height=480,left=50,top=50');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}

function popUpMenu(url,name) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,name,'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=0,width=580,height=480,left=100,top=50');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}

function externalPopup(url) {
//	if (newWindow[i]) {
//		if (newWindow[i].closed == false) {
//			newWindow[i].focus();
//		}
//	}
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,'externalSite','width=700,height=600,top=50,left=50,toolbar=1,location=1,directories=1,status=1,menubar=1,scrollbars=1,resizable=1');
	newWindow[i].focus();
	i++;
}

function popUpFlash(name,width,height) {
	var windowHeight = parseInt(height) + 38
	var url = "/Flash/FlashPopup.asp?name=" + name + "&w=" + width + "&h=" + height;
	var specs = "'toolbar=0,location=0,directories=0,status=0,menubar=0,scrollbars=0,resizable=0,width=" + width + ",height=" + windowHeight + ",left=100,top=50'";
	newWindow[i] = window.open(url,'Flash',specs);
	newWindow[i].focus();
}

function jumper(objText, index) {
	if (objText.value.length >= objText.size) objText.form.elements[index+1].focus();
}

function closePopup(newWindow){
	for (j=0; j <= newWindow.length; j++){
	  if (newWindow[j]) {
		newWindow[j].close();
	  }
	}
}
// -->
</script>

<!-- SEARCH BOX -->
			<table width=125 cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0>
				<tr>
					<td width=5 bgcolor="#FFCC00"><img src="http://images.bestbuy.com/images/spacer.gif" width=5 height=1 border=0 alt=""></td>
					<td width=5 bgcolor="#FFCC00"><img src="http://images.bestbuy.com/images/spacer.gif" width=5 height=1 border=0 alt=""></td>
					<td width=112 bgcolor="#FFCC00">
						
							<form method="post" name="searchform" action="http://www.bestbuy.com/search/res.asp?m=0&cat=0&scat=0" onsubmit="return ValidateSearchForm(this)">
						
						<img src="http://images.bestbuy.com/images/spacer.gif" width=112 height=6 border=0 alt=""><br>
						<span class="nav-major">
							SEARCH BestBuy.com <br>
						</span>
						<img src="http://images.bestbuy.com/images/spacer.gif" width=1 height=3 border=0 alt=""><br>
						<input type="text" name="SV" size=12 maxlength=64 tabindex=1><br>
						<img src="http://images.bestbuy.com/images/spacer.gif" width=1 height=3 border=0 alt=""><br>
